appDesc.message: Provides an instinctive orientation in the digital space.

legendGreen.message: Green: Intention of service - useful, open.

legendYellow.message: Yellow: Intention of assertion - strong will, clear goal.

legendBlue.message: Blue: Intention of sharing knowledge - information, rationality.

legendPurple.message: Purple: Intention of meaning - vision, idea, transcendence.

legendRed.message: Red: Intention of survival - crisis or outdated projects.

legendGold.message: Gold: Purity of intent - highest integrity.
